name: Boundary
description: This is a stealthy zombie game. Players play an agent and sneak into the laboratory to perform tasks to address the root causes of the mutations in the game. In the game, players can use props such as knives, pistols and flashlights to give full play to the nature of stealth. Short knives can kill a weak point in the back, pistols can shoot remotely, flashlights can illuminate, and can store strong light to blind the enemy.
developers: 大连未蓝科技有限公司
publishers: 大连未蓝科技有限公司
